publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excllent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Text begins: The Committee of Estates taking into consideration that divers persons in the kingdom, especially in the shires of the west, tennents to disaffected heretors & masters, have given no small testimony of their affection to the Covenant by their late hearty concurrence in arms ....
A proclamation "that all quarterings and publick burdens imposed upon malignant heretors and masters since the first of September last" shall be on them alone, and not on their tenants.
Signed at foot of text: Tho. Henderson.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
